backend/main.mo: Implements authorization, user profile storage, contact form submission handling, and authenticated retrieval of sorted submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, associated files, components, and test IDs used for project feature tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all major frontend files for reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH design tokens for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app into the root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and provides the global router provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Mandatory dialog for new users to submit their display name via a profile save mutation.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Client-side validated contact form that submits data to the backend and shows success feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with company info, quick links, contact details, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements the site header with logo, navigation, login button, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout including header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates the document title and meta description when a page loads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Adds hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmissions.ts: Fetches contact form submissions from the backend with a limit parameter.
Provides a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, color theme variables, and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About page with company story, mission, values, and supporting visuals.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with company contact details and a contact form, using page metadata hooks and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section, value propositions, and featured product highlights, including navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Shows authenticated users a list of contact form submissions with loading, error, and profile-setup handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists product categories with descriptions and items, generating a grid of product cards and setting page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Presents a grid of IT service offerings with icons, descriptions, and feature lists, along with page metadata setup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, and clear URL and session parameters, supporting both query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, spacing, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s current state, including features, requirements, image assets, and metadata for the SGS Solutions website build.
